title: SC EP:34 Charged by a Sasquatch!
itunes:title: SC EP:34 Charged by a Sasquatch!
description: On tonight's show we will have 3 guests. Each sharing their encounters with Sasquatch. Bob Garrett returns and shares more information about the torn up camp and encounters he has personally had. Bob will  discuss the time he was charged by a Sasquatch and give us some insight on their behavior. The "big thicket" has a lot of bigfoot activity
